verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
A
All Heaven declares
The glory of the Risen Lord
Who can compare with
The beauty of the Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Forever You will be
(Forever)
The Lamb upon the throne
(On the throne)
We gladly bow the knee
(We bow)
And worship You alone
(Alone)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
We will proclaim
The glory of the risen Lord
Who once was slain
To reconcile man to God

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Forever You will be
(Forever)
The Lamb upon the throne
(On the throne)
We gladly bow the knee
(We bow)
And worship You alone
(Alone)
